location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, to the Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, informs Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay, that he has granted a set of bills on the Honourable Board for 10,000 rupees, in favour of Shaikh Zahee [Zakee Khan, Minister to the Prince of Shiraz], to meet the demands of the Residency.
